quote: Absurdity is one of the most human things about us: a manifestation of our most advanced and interesting characteristics.
author: Thomas Nagel

quote: Absurdity is the ecstasy of intellectualism.
author: Criss Jami,  Salomé: In Every Inch In Every Mile

quote: Part of the appeal of the fantastic is taking ridiculous ideas very seriously and pretending they're not absurd.
author: China Miéville

quote: Only those who attempt the absurd can achieve the impossible.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Absurdity is what I like most in life, and there's humor in struggling in ignorance. If you saw a man repeatedly running into a wall until he was a bloody pulp, after a while it would make you laugh because it becomes absurd.
author: David Lynch

quote: In order to attain the impossible, one must attempt the absurd.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: Only he who attempts the absurd is capable of achieving the impossible.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: If at first the idea is not absurd, then there is no hope for it.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Happiness and the absurd are two sons of the same earth. They are inseparable.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I don't think life is absurd. I think we are all here for a huge purpose. I think we shrink from the immensity of the purpose we are here for.
author: Norman Mailer

quote: Being crazy isn't enough.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Remember, today’s truth could be tomorrow’s absurdity.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Even if it's absurd to think you can change things, it's even more absurd to believe that it is foolish and unimportant to try.
author: Peter C. Newman,  Here Be Dragons: Telling Tales Of People, Passion and Power

quote: I have a fine sense of the ridiculous, but no sense of humor.
author: Edward Albee

quote: One person's craziness is another person's reality.
author: Tim Burton

quote: Even though you can't expect to defeat the absurdity of the world, you must make the attempt. That's morality, that's religion, that's art, that's life.
author: Phil Ochs

quote: Nonsense is that which does not fit into the prearranged patterns which we have superimposed on reality...Nonsense is nonsense only when we have not yet found that point of view from which it makes sense.
author: Gary Zukav

quote: It is sometimes an appropriate response to reality to go insane.
author: Philip K. Dick,  VALIS

quote: Silly String [10w] Life' an absurdity radiating from a spine of silly string.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Our society is run by insane people for insane objectives
author: John Lennon

quote: Silly things do cease to be silly if they are done by sensible people in an impudent way.
author: Jane Austen,  Emma

quote: Those who can make you believe absurdities, can make you commit atrocities.
author: Voltaire,  Questions sur les Miracles à M. Claparede, Professeur de Théologie à Genève, par un Proposant: Ou Extrait de Diverses Lettres de M. de Voltaire

quote: Brilliance is impossible without a touch of insanity.
author: Skyla Madi,  Your Guardian Angel

quote: You never see animals going through the absurd and often horrible fooleries of magic and religion. . . . Only man behaves with such gratuitous folly. It is the price he has to pay for being intelligent but not, as yet, quite intelligent enough.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Whoever wishes to become a philosopher must learn not to be frightened by absurdities.
author: Bertrand Russell,  The Problems of Philosophy

quote: I have too much respect for the idea of God to make it responsible for such an absurd world.
author: Georges Duhamel

quote: First Things First [10w] God created the possibility of absurditybefore he created man.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: [Quantum mechanics] describes nature as absurd from the point of view of common sense. And yet it fully agrees with experiment. So I hope you can accept nature as She is - absurd.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Imperfection is beauty, madness is genius and it's better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Do you think it's possible for an entire nation to be insane?
author: Terry Pratchett,  Monstrous Regiment

quote: There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line.
author: Oscar Levant

quote: ‎"If there is no God, then man and the universe are doomed. Like prisoners condemned to death, we await our unavoidable execution. There is no God, and there is no immortality. And what is the consequence of this? It means that life itself is absurd. It means that the life we have is without ultimate significance, value, or purpose.
author: William Lane Craig,  Reasonable Faith

quote: Insanity is often the logic of an accurate mind overtasked
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.,  Autocrat of the Breakfast Table

quote: The most absurd and reckless aspirations have sometimes led to extraordinary success.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Unless you are willing to do the ridiculous, God will not do the miraculous. When you have God, you don’t have to know everything about it; you just do it.
author: Mother Angelica

quote: Collective madness is called sanity ..
author: Paulo Coelho,  Veronika Decides to Die

quote: Scientists have calculated that the chances of something so patently absurd actually existing are millions to one.But magicians have calculated that million-to-one chances crop up nine times out of ten.
author: Terry Pratchett,  Mort

quote: A sense of humor keen enough to show a man his own absurdities will keep him from the commission of all sins, or nearly all, save those worth committing.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: When you are irrationally irrational you may find that life is magical.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A question that sometimes drives me hazy: am I or are the others crazy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I remember discussions with Bohr which went through many hours till very late at night and ended almost in despair; and when at the end of the discussion I went alone for a walk in the neighbouring park I repeated to myself again and again the question: Can nature possibly be so absurd as it seemed to us in these atomic experiments?
author: Werner Heisenberg

quote: With humor, it's so subjective that trying to think of what the ideal reader would think would drive you crazy.
author: Calvin Trillin

quote: How do we account for this paradox that the absence of Law universalizes prohibition ... The psychoanalytic name for this obscene injunction for this obscene call, ENJOY, is superego. The problem today is not how to get rid of your inhibitions and to be able to spontaneously enjoy. The problem is how to get rid of this injunction to enjoy.
author: Slavoj Žižek

quote: There's plenty of sense in nonsense sometimes, if you wish to look for it.
author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Angel

quote: It is just as crazy not to be crazy about Christ as it is to be crazy about anything else.
author: Peter Kreeft,  Jesus-Shock

quote: Incredibly intelligent people always seem odd to those who are not as sharp.
author: Alexei Maxim Russell,  Why Not-World

quote: Too much sanity may be madness — and maddest of all: to see life as it is, and not as it should be!
author: Dale Wasserman,  Man of La Mancha

quote: Rationality vs. Madness [10w] Rationality maintains the world's status quo.Madness drives the change.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Animals are irrational men
author: Safir Kassim Booudjelal

quote: You cannot conceive, nor can I, of the appalling strangeness of the mercy of God.
author: Graham Greene,  Brighton Rock
